title: Implement GET /api/sites/[siteSlug]/listings API
body:
## Description
Implement the GET /api/sites/[siteSlug]/listings API endpoint according to the specification in `specs/api/listings/GET_listings.md`.

## Requirements
- Retrieve all listings for a given site slug
- Support filtering by category ID
- Implement pagination with configurable page size
- Handle test environment by using appropriate key prefixes
- Parse and validate JSON data from Redis
- Implement resilient fetching that doesn't fail if one listing is corrupted
- Optimize pagination for large listing sets

## Acceptance Criteria
- API endpoint follows the specification exactly
- Listings are returned with correct pagination
- Category filtering works correctly
- Proper error handling is implemented
- Tenant isolation is enforced
- Corrupted listings are handled gracefully
- Unit tests cover all scenarios in the specification
- Integration tests verify the API works end-to-end

## Related Specifications
- `specs/api/listings/GET_listings.md`

title: Implement GET /api/sites/[siteSlug]/listings/[listingId] API
body:
## Description
Implement the GET /api/sites/[siteSlug]/listings/[listingId] API endpoint according to the specification in `specs/api/listings/GET_listing_by_id.md`.

## Requirements
- Retrieve a single listing by ID
- Validate the listing belongs to the specified site
- Include category information with the listing
- Generate and include the listing's public URL
- Properly handle non-existent listings
- Implement tenant isolation
- Validate site exists before attempting to fetch listing

## Acceptance Criteria
- API endpoint follows the specification exactly
- Listing data is returned correctly with category information
- Public URL is generated correctly
- Site-listing relationship is validated
- Proper error handling is implemented
- Tenant isolation is enforced
- Unit tests cover all scenarios in the specification
- Integration tests verify the API works end-to-end
